name: Flying Police Dog Prison Break - Prisoner Escape Jail Breakout Mission from Alcatraz
name_original: Flying Police Dog Prison Break - Prisoner Escape Jail Breakout Mission from Alcatraz
description:
You might have played police dog chase games & prison escape jail breakout games where you played as a police cop in charge of the jail and your duty was to stop the criminals escape out from the jail. You used your police dog to chase the prisoners and brought them back to the lockups. But this time we are bringing you a new flavor where the game is a blend of escape the prison games, police dog games & the flying games.

We bring you the most exciting Flying Police Dog Prison Break game in one of the solitary flying games where you have appointed in the jail as in charge of security and equipped with the latest flying shepherd dogs. Who can fly and reach their prey in no time. These police dogs can run as well as fly so catching the prisoners escaping from the jail building top roof will not be a big deal for these flying police dogs. You are the in-charge of a prison, a real police dog to do the security job for the jail. It is your duty now to watch out prison escape by city criminals. The security of the prison and of the city is in your hands now as the theif or the criminal escaping from prison will be the threat of crime to the city.

Features of Police Dog Prisoner Escape Simulator
=> Extreme chase game
=> Cop Dog Chase Simulator
=> Criminals vs Police dog
=> Sniff, chase and catch robbers, thieves and thugs
=> Big Security officer dog
=> Smooth Controls
=> Exciting but challenging gamePlay
=> Amazing sounds and graphics
